Question: In the 2019 movie 'Cats', what did director Tom Hooper demand regarding the portrayal of cats?
Options:
A. He wanted animated cats without any real-life references.
B. He insisted on using costly and time-consuming full renders before reviewing scenes.
C. He allowed the crew to use any style of movement for the cats.
D. He preferred to use only CGI without any real-life inspiration.
Answer: He insisted on using costly and time-consuming full renders before reviewing scenes.
